en_text: Ten candied fruits using Hiyori's money!
jp_text: ひよりの金で杏子飴
google_translated: Ayako with money

en_text: That's too much, you freeloader!
jp_text: 奢らせすぎたろ
google_translated: I'm too much

en_text: Now don't pass out on your way home!
jp_text: 帰り道で爆睡すんじゃねえぞ
google_translated: I'm going to sleep on the way back

en_text: Happy New Year, Hiyori!
jp_text: あけましておめでとう　ひより
google_translated: Happy New Year

en_text: Oh, maybe your first money offering of the year could come before that?
jp_text: その前に　俺に初お賽銭くれちゃう系
google_translated: Before that, I will give me the first money

en_text: What is it, Hiyori?
jp_text: どうした　ひより
google_translated: What's wrong

en_text: Who are you?
jp_text: どなたですか　あなた
google_translated: What are you doing
